CustomBehavior.Text:
Currently the bot does not support the Mesh for the battleship

You must manually complete the quests up until after you shoot the bats down with the gun cannon.

Click Continue Profile after you're off the flying ship to continue the bot.

Currently the bot does not support the Mesh for the battleship

You must manually complete the quests up until quest "Greymane's Gambit".

After you complete Gretmanes Gambit -
this dialog box will automatically go away and the bot will continue on its own.

CustomBehavior.TerminateWhen: Unit(90907) == null || Unit(90907, u => u.IsDead) != null
